articles.author: Lewis Pennock
articles.title: Man guns down estranged brother on his own doorstep then dies in shootout with cops - Daily Mail
articles.description: A California man murdered his brother at home in Utah before he was killed by police in a dramatic shootout that was recorded on a Ring doorbell cam.
articles.content:
A California man ambushed and murdered his brother on his own doorstep in Utah before he was killed by police in a dramatic shootout that was recorded on a Ring doorbell cam.
